text: "Me U & Hennessy" is a song by American hip hop recording artist Dej Loaf. The song was released on April 20, 2015 by Columbia Records.https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/me-u-hennessy-feat.-lil- wayne/id984052111 The official remix features American rapper Lil Wayne. ==Music video== The music video for "Me U & Hennessy" was released on April 17, 2015.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JQbiR2gtyw0 ==Commercial performance== "Me U & Hennessy" peaked at number six on the U.S. Bubbling Under Hot 100 chart. The song also reached number 38 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart. ==Charts== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2015) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"|US Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles (Billboard) | 6 |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2015 singles Category:2015 songs Category:Dej Loaf songs Category:Columbia Records singles Category:Songs written by Dej Loaf
title: Me U & Hennessy
